description: A blueprint for analyzing the extent of damage to a residential property.

description_of_property.instruction: Provide a brief description of the property, including the type of building, number of stories, and any other relevant details.

Damage_Location.instruction: The specific area of the house that has been damaged by the fallen tree.

Damage_Severity.instruction: An assessment of the overall severity of the damage to the property, based on the extent of the structural damage visible in the image. Limit the field values to enum['Minor', 'Moderate', 'Severe']

surrounding_environment.instruction: Describe the surrounding environment, including the presence of other buildings, trees, or any other relevant features.

Potential_Causes.instruction: An assessment of the likely cause of the tree falling, based on the visible damage and surrounding conditions. Limit the field values to enum['Storm', 'High Winds', 'Decay', 'Other']
